base.name: DataSource
base.description: Specifies a data file that can be used as a source.

parameter_definitions.name: data_integration_id
parameter_definitions.description: ID of the integration to be used.

parameter_definitions.name: file_name
parameter_definitions.description: Name of the file to use as a data source.

parameter_definitions.name: header_as_first_row
parameter_definitions.description: Check this box if the file has a header.

parameter_definitions.name: time_samples_as_column
parameter_definitions.description: Check this box to use a column in the data file as the source of time stamps for data samples(rows).

parameter_definitions.name: time_column
parameter_definitions.description: Index of the time stamps column. Default is 0, which is the first column.

parameter_definitions.name: sampling_interval
parameter_definitions.description: Time interval between two data samples(rows) of the data file whe there is no time column. Must be > 0.

parameter_definitions.name: data_columns
parameter_definitions.description: Index or String to select the data column for the output. Default is 1, which is the first column after time column.

parameter_definitions.name: extrapolation
parameter_definitions.description: Method used to compute output after end-of-file has been reached.

parameter_definitions.name: interpolation
parameter_definitions.description: Method used to compute output at times between time stamps.
